reviews.review_msg:
Jan is an engaging speaker in class, but good luck getting any support outside of class or even days before your final. This excerpt from his final announcement pretty much sums it up.

"That's it from us. We are heading into the Easter weekend now, and will not be available via email as we spend time with our families. 

Good luck on Tuesday!"
Bad Final exam, forced us to buy a lot of case studies

He started off clear and supportive, but as the semester went on, he wasn't prepared for class, did not make homework very clear (and then expected to have done things prior to class without telling us) and just didn't seem interested to be there. He had a good start though so it wasn't a consistently horrible experience.
